SA21n1413:1725: tasmāt siddhaṃ paramādvayaṃ bodhirūpaṃ sa cāha -
SA21n1413:1726: ṇau ghare ṇau vaṇe vohi ṭhiu ehu pariāṇahu bheu |
SA21n1413:1728: idam upalakṣaṇāyāṃ na ghare na vaneṣu bodhisthitam |
SA21n1413:1729: evaṃ bhedaṃ parijānāsi sandhyābhāṣāntare'pi gṛhaṃ śarīraṃ vanaṃ ghaṭapaṭādiṣu tatra na bodhiḥ |
SA21n1413:1731: evaṃ bhedaṃ yat dṛśyate lokādi tat sarvam utpannavināśinaḥ |
SA21n1413:1734: yairvikalpanā vikalpasi samastā saṅgatā tyajasīti vistaraḥ |
SA21n1413:1736: ehu so appā ehu paru jo paribhāvai kovi |
SA21n1413:1737: te viṇu vandhe veṭṭhi kiu appa vimukkau tovi | | iti |
SA21n1413:1738: idamātmā na idaṃ paraḥ yena kenacidviparibhāvitaṃ tena vinā bandhanena ātmānaṃ viṭakitaṃ vikalīkṛtaṃ mukto'pi svabhāvayātaṃ tadā no muktaḥ tasmāt svaparavibhāgaṃ na kriyate iti yāvat | tadiha -
SA21n1413:1739: para appāṇa ma bhanti karū saala ṇirantara vuddha |
SA21n1413:1740: paha se ṇimmala paramapau citta sahāve suddha | | iti | (146)
SA21n1413:1742: parañcātmadañca ekasvabhāvaṃ na dvayarūpeṇa bhrāntiṃ kuru kintarhi sakalasattvādhātunirantarādāveva svabhāvena śuddhaḥ tadādāveva paribhāvanāyānantakamalāvṛtā na buddhātmānaṃ paribhāvayanti |
SA21n1413:1743: evaṃ dvayarahitena buddhaḥ saḥ nirmalaṃ paramacitaṃ svabhāvatorūpaṃ bodhicittaṃ svabhāvarahitatayā -
SA21n1413:1744: addaa citta- tarūaraha gau tihuvaṇe vitthāra |
SA21n1413:1745: karūṇā phullīphala dharai ṇāu paratta ūāra | | iti |
SA21n1413:1746: ukte sati paropakāraṃ sūcayati yadadvayaṃ cittaṃ yogināṃ taddharantu bhavarājaḥ |
SA21n1413:1751: sarveṣāṃ sarvāsāṃ śuddhatvādi paripūrayati iti te tayā | | su
SA21n1413:1752: [ suṇṇa tarūvara phulliau karūṇā viviha vicitta |
SA21n1413:1753: aṇṇā bhoa parattaphalu ehu sokkha paru citta |
SA21n1413:1754: suṇṇa taruvara ṇikkarūṇa jahi puṇu mūla ṇa sāha |
SA21n1413:1755: tahi ālamūla jo karai tasu paḍibhajjāi vāha | |
SA21n1413:1756: ekkemvī ekkevvi taru te kāraṇe phala ekka |
SA21n1413:1757: e abhiṇṇā jo muṇai so bhavaṇivvāṇa vimukka | | (147)
SA21n1413:1759: jo atthīaṇa ṭhīaū so jai jāi ṇirāsa |
SA21n1413:1760: khaṇḍa sarāve bhikkha varū cchaḍahu e gihavāsa | |
SA21n1413:1762: manasi vihāya tadā sattveṣu karūṇāvantaḥ yasmādāyāti |
SA21n1413:1763: yaḥ kaścidathinaḥ sa [ yadi ] nirāsaṃ yāti mayā lokena kiñcit dattam |
SA21n1413:1769: para- ūāra ṇa kīaū atthi ṇa dīau dāṇa |
SA21n1413:1770: ehu saṃsāre kavaṇa phalu varū cchaḍḍahu appāṇa | | iti |
SA21n1413:1771: kintena bhogena gṛheṇa vā kriyate yataḥ paropakāraṃ na bhavati |
SA21n1413:1773: tacca tena dhanena evam idaṃ saṃsāre sthitatvāt kiṃ phalaṃ bhavati na bhavati [yāva]d varamidam ātmānaṃ tyajāmaḥ |
SA21n1413:1783: svārthaṃ vāpi parārthaṃ vā sādhitaṃ me śubhaṃ yataḥ |
